In 1975, the Taipei County Government demolished the shrine and converted it into a Chinese palace form of the Loyalty Temple, known as the "Taipei County Loyalty Temple". Since the temple is surrounded by green and ancient pine, you can listen to Songtao and overlook Guanyin Mountain in the downstairs of the brand of Zhonglie Yong, which has a beautiful view and is one of the eight old freshwater scenery. address: No.141 Section 2, Yangde Ave, Taipei 111, Taiwan
label: 觀光
review: Former residence of Lin Yutang - A generation of Chinese masters living in Yangming Mountain in their later years, designed the building where they lived in retirement, adopted the concept of Chinese and Western mergers, with Chinese blue glazed house tiles, Western-style columns with twisted rope lines, and designed the second-level external landscape Yang using the gap of natural terrain Taiwan, both ventilation and lighting, the current house displays the memory of the former owner, which makes people feel ancient and serene.

address: No.49 Nanhai Road, Zhongzheng District, Taipei 100 Taiwan
label: 觀光
review: Taiwan History Museum, referred to as the Museum of History, was originally called the Museum of Historical Cultural Relics, the first public museum established after the government of the Republic of China moved to Taiwan, and some of the cultural relics came from the original Henan Museum (now Henan Museum). The original site is the Taiwan Governor's Mansion's property exhibition hall, built in the Japanese period in 1916. After the Shibo Hall moved in, the overall building was gradually converted from the original wooden building to a Chinese palace. After many years of closure, the museum was re-opened for public visits in 2024. part 2

address: No. 360號, Pingyi Rd, Zhongzheng District, Keelung City, Taiwan 202
label: 活動
review: A good place to visit to learn and understand about natural rocks formation. The rocks here are formed naturally by sea water and wind. All rocks will look different overtime and it is up to your imagination on what the rock looks like. There are schedule guided tour here. Have to book a slot at the tourist centre.

address: Zhongshan Dist., Taipei, Taiwan
label: 活動

address: Bottom of Minsheng West Road, Datong District, Taipei City (Dadaoyu Pier-Inside Water Gate No. 5)
label: 活動
review: Ren'an Hospital - It was built in Showa 2 years (1927), a hospital opened for locals, and the doctors and grandparents were doctors for three generations. It was widely known as the medical service in Dadaocheng area, and made Ren'an Hospital one of the most important hospitals in Dadaocheng. The facade of the building is baroque carved, and the whole is very stable. The daughter wall above is decorated in a lot of detail. The bottom is to wash stones and some magnet tiles. The building is a shop house building on the second floor, a corner seven-open street house, a corner facade window for three small rooms, and the other windows for two small rooms.

address: Tamsui Fisherman's Wharf, Taiwan
label: 活動
review: Freshwater Fisherman's Wharf - New Beishifu has been developed into a multi-functional leisure fishing port with beautiful floating piers and a wide port area park, and a boat-shaped bridge across the port area for pedestrians to view. There are also more than 330 metres of wooden plank road on the pier, leaning against the fence to enjoy the view of the Vale Estuary, is a leisurely enjoyment, and the Fisherman's Wharf in the evening is one of the best places to enjoy the sunset.

address: No. 69號, Yangming Creek Walkway, Beitou District, Taipei City, Taiwan 112
label: 活動
review: The small oil pit is located on the western slope of Qixing Mountain, also known as the sulfur valley, which represents the landscape of Qixing Mountain. Under the action of a vigorous post-volcano, the underground heat source is still very vigorous, and the sulfur jet is spewed from a thinner part of the earth's crust and creaking. Come here to enjoy a string of crystalline, needle-like, yellow color, beautiful sulfur crystallization, and listen to the burst of the jet mouth, experience the situation of volcanic activity.
